stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you breach HQ, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach HQ, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
title: Nerve Agent
